title: Prepaid RP Card Pin notWorking
body: A friend sent me a code this morning for $10 of rp, when I went to put it in, the code was not apparently valid, please help, thank you

replies.body: That's weird!  Is your friend from a different region?  RP Cards are specific to their own region, so that could be a possibility.  In any case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Billing team can look into this with you to see what's going on and offer options. You may need to get some screenshots handy, in your ticket.   We'll see you there!
